title: Global energy commodity price index 2013 to 2030
yAxis: Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2019 to 2021, and lastly slightly increasing from 2021 to 2025.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2022 and 2025.
Maximum Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars, about 79.1 was reported at Year 2025
Minimum Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars about 72.0 was reached at Year 2020

mid_summary: In general Price index in real 2010 U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
